thread.title: BRIEF-K92 Mining Announces Increase To Marketed Offering Of Units

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-K92 Mining Announces Increase To Marketed Offering Of Units
text: February 13, 2018 / 8:08 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-K92 Mining Announces Increase To Marketed Offering Of Units Reuters Staff Feb 13 (Reuters) - K92 Mining Inc: * K92 MINING INC. ANNOUNCES INCREASE TO MARKETED OFFERING OF UNITS * SAYS TO INCREASE SIZE OF ITS PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED C$5 MILLION “BEST EFFORTS” PRIVATE PLACEMENT OFFERING TO UP TO C$6.5 MILLION * SAYS AS PER UPSIZED DEAL TERMS, AGENTS HAVE AGREED TO SELL, ON “BEST EFFORTS” PRIVATE PLACEMENT BASIS, UP TO 14.4 MILLION UNITS OF CO AT C$0.45/UNIT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
